description: This module contains functions to access the trademark datasource.
authors:
Alexander.Kreutz@28msec.com

Trademark data format

All trademarks are returned in JSON format. All key names correspond to the XML element names of the trademark daily applications files of the USPTO. For a documentation of this data format look at http://www.uspto.gov/products/xml-resources.jsp into the trademark daily applications section.

Here is an example trademark in JSON format:

 { "_id" : "73299733", "uid" : 6588091, "serial-number" : "73299733", "correspondent" : { "address-1" : "BRUNS & JENNEY", "address-2" : "512 HILLS BLDG.", "address-3" : "SYRACUSE", "address-4" : "NEW YORK 13202" }, "case-file-event-statements" : [ { "number" : "3", "type" : "O", "description-text" : "ABANDONMENT - EXPRESS MAILED", "date" : "19830131", "code" : "ABN1" }, { "number" : "2", "type" : "F", "description-text" : "LETTER OF SUSPENSION MAILED", "date" : "19810624", "code" : "CNSL" }, { "number" : "1", "type" : "D", "description-text" : "ASSIGNED TO EXAMINER", "date" : "19810616", "code" : "DOCK" } ], "case-file-header" : { "color-drawing-current-in" : "F", "drawing-3d-filed-in" : "F", "collective-service-mark-in" : "F", "concurrent-use-in" : "F", "location-date" : "19830131", "abandonment-date" : "19830131", "amended-to-44e-application-in" : "F", "status-code" : "602", "trademark-in" : "T", "color-drawing-filed-in" : "F", "intent-to-use-current-in" : "F", "certification-mark-in" : "F", "section-8-accepted-in" : "F", "filing-basis-filed-as-44d-in" : "F", "amended-to-use-application-in" : "F", "intent-to-use-in" : "F", "renewal-filed-in" : "F", "section-15-filed-in" : "F", "filed-as-use-application-in" : "T", "filing-basis-current-44d-in" : "F", "drawing-3d-current-in" : "F", "filing-basis-filed-as-44e-in" : "F", "cancellation-pending-in" : "F", "published-concurrent-in" : "F", "filing-basis-current-44e-in" : "F", "mark-drawing-code" : "3000", "service-mark-in" : "F", "mark-identification" : "VILLAGE GREEN", "interference-pending-in" : "F", "standard-characters-claimed-in" : "F", "section-15-acknowledged-in" : "F", "law-office-assigned-location-code" : "580", "filing-basis-filed-as-66a-in" : "F", "attorney-docket-number" : " ", "opposition-pending-in" : "F", "section-8-filed-in" : "F", "filing-basis-current-66a-in" : "F", "section-12c-in" : "F", "foreign-priority-in" : "F", "employee-name" : "MOSKOWITZ, SIDNEY", "collective-trademark-in" : "F", "amended-to-44d-application-in" : "F", "section-2f-in-part-in" : "F", "principal-register-amended-in" : "F", "section-8-partial-accept-in" : "F", "concurrent-use-proceeding-in" : "F", "use-application-currently-in" : "T", "filing-date" : "19810226", "supplemental-register-amended-in" : "F", "status-date" : "19830131", "supplemental-register-in" : "F", "filing-current-no-basis-in" : "F", "amended-to-itu-application-in" : "F", "current-location" : "UNKNOWN", "change-registration-in" : "F", "section-2f-in" : "F", "collective-membership-mark-in" : "F", "without-basis-currently-in" : "F" }, "registration-number" : "0000000", "case-file-owners" : [ { "address-1" : "1840 LEMOYNE AVE.", "nationality" : { "state" : "NH" }, "postcode" : "13208", "state" : "NY", "party-name" : "TIMBERLINE STOVES NORTHEAST, INC.", "party-type" : "10", "city" : "SYRACUSE", "entry-number" : "1", "legal-entity-type-code" : "03" } ], "transaction-date" : "0000", "case-file-statements" : [ { "text" : "STOVES FOR BURNING SOLID FUELS AND INSERT BLOWERS FOR CIRCULATING AIR ABOVETHE PERIPHERY OF STOVES", "type-code" : "GS0111" } ], "classifications" : [ { "international-code-total-no" : "1", "first-use-anywhere-date" : "19801202", "status-code" : "8", "first-use-in-commerce-date" : "19801202", "us-code-total-no" : "1", "primary-code" : "011", "international-code" : [ "011" ], "status-date" : "19990804", "us-code" : [ "034" ] } ] }

functions.name: archive
functions.description:
Retrieves archive metadata for a given archive name.

Example

   trademarks:archive("http://storage.googleapis.com/trademarks/applications/2014/apc140304.zip")

returns the archive metadata:

 {
   "_id" : "531895007AACBD99F7831583",
   "href" : "http://storage.googleapis.com/trademarks/applications/2014/apc140304.zip",
   "status" : "done",
   "started" : "2014-03-06T15:32:16.71Z",
   "finished" : "2014-03-06T15:32:16.71Z",
   "created" : 29997,
   "updated" : 0,
   "errors" : 0,
   "skipped" : 7055,
   "firstUpdate" : 24096,
   "lastUpdate" : 54092
 }
functions.summary: Retrieves archive metadata for a given archive name.

parameters.name: href
parameters.description: the name of the archive

returns.description: An object containing the archive metadata

functions.name: archives
functions.description: Retrieves a list of all trademark archive names that have been imported.
functions.summary: Retrieves a list of all trademark archive names that have been imported.

returns.description: A string sequence containing the archive names

functions.name: get-by-serial-number
functions.description:
Retrieves a trademark by its serial number.

Example:

trademarks:get-by-serial-number("73299733")

will return a JSON trademark as described in the data format section.
functions.summary: Retrieves a trademark by its serial number.

parameters.name: serial-number
parameters.description: The serial number of the trademark to return.

returns.description: The JSON object containing the trademark or an empty-sequence if the trademark is not found.

functions.name: search-correspondents
functions.description: Search all trademark correspondent names that are similar to the provided name and the number of trademarks with this correspondent.
functions.summary: Search all trademark correspondent names that are similar to the provided name and the number of trademarks with this correspondent.

returns.description: a sequence of objects containing two keys: name - the exact owner name, trademarks : the number of trademarks with this owner name

functions.name: search-owners
functions.description: Search all trademark owner names that are similar to the provided name and the number of trademarks with this owner.
functions.summary: Search all trademark owner names that are similar to the provided name and the number of trademarks with this owner.

returns.description: a sequence of objects containing two keys: name - the exact owner name, trademarks : the number of trademarks with this owner name

functions.name: search
functions.description:
This function searches the trademark datasource for trademarks matching the given criteria. The result may be sorted and pagination may be applied.

The result may be restricted by using these keys in the criteria object:

  • mark-identification the name of the trademark. Will also search for similar names unless similar:false is also set
  • similar if set to true will also search for similar mark-identifications, if false will only return exact matches. Default is true.
  • attorney will only return trademarks with a given attorney.
  • owner will only return trademarks having a specific owner.
  • similar-owners if set to true also trademarks with a similar owner are returned. if set to false only exact matches are returned
  • correspondent will only return trademarks with the given correspondent
  • similar-correspondents if set to true also trademarks with a similar correspondent are returned. if set to false only exact matches are returned
  • type restricts the search result by trademark type. Allowed values are 'F' for logo and 'T' for wordmark.
  • status restrict by trademark status. Allowed values are "live" or "dead".
  • international-code restrict results by international code. May by a string or an array of strings.
  • design-code restrict results by design code. May be a string or an array of strings.
  • serial-number restrict by serial number
  • registration-number restrict by registration number
  • filing-date restrict by filing date
  • registration-date restrict by registration date
The pagination may be controlled by using these keys of the criteria object:
  • page select the number of the page to return. Default value is 1.
  • page-size sets the page size of the result pagination. Default value is 50.
The sort order of the results may be controlled by using an "orderby" property. These values are allowed:
  • rank If the mark identification is included in the search criteria results may be sorted by search rank.
  • serial-number results are sorted by serial number
  • filing-date results are sorted by filing.date
  • registration-date results are sorted by registration date

The result of the function is an object having these pairs:

  • numberOfResults The total number of matching trademarks
  • numberOfPages The total number of result pages
  • currentPage The number of the page returned
  • resultsAn array containg the matching trademarks of the requested page
functions.summary: This function searches the trademark datasource for trademarks matching the given criteria.

parameters.name: criteria
parameters.description: An object with the search criteria

returns.description: An object containing the results as described above

functions.name: trademark-for-serial-or-registration-number
functions.description:
Retrieves a trademark by its serial number or registration number.

Example:

trademarks:trademark-for-serial-or-registration-number("73299733")

will return a JSON trademark as described in the data format section.
functions.summary: Retrieves a trademark by its serial number or registration number.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The serial number or registration number of the trademark to return.

returns.description: The JSON object containing the trademark or an empty-sequence if the trademark is not found.

functions.name: uptodate-trademarks-in-archive
functions.description:
Retrieves all trademarks contained in an archive that are still up to date. Trademarks that have been updated in a newer archive are included in that archive.

Example:

  let $archive := trademarks:archive("http://storage.googleapis.com/trademarks/applications/2014/apc140304.zip")
  return trademarks:uptodate-trademarks-in-archive($archive)

returns a sequence of all trademarks the were updates in the apc140304 archive and have no newer version available. All trademarks are returned as JSON objects as described in the data format section.
functions.summary: Retrieves all trademarks contained in an archive that are still up to date.

returns.description: A sequence of all trademarks in that archive

variables.name: trademarks:connection
variables.description: Connection to the trademark data source
